storage.d: Data lives on your device only.

data.title: Information Collection
data.body: Petlytics does not collect, store, or transmit any personal information. All pet health data, records, and settings remain exclusively on your device.

local.title: Local Processing
local.body: All data processing happens locally on your device. Your pet's health information never leaves your phone unless you explicitly choose to export or share it.

usage.title: App Usage
usage.noAds: No ads. No tracking. No data selling.
bullets: Track pet health records and symptoms
Generate PDF reports for vet visits

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.body: We do not share any data with third parties. When you export a PDF report or share information, you control exactly what is shared and with whom.

permissions.title: Device Permissions
bullets: Camera: To capture photos of symptoms or documents
Photo Library: To save and access pet photos
permissions.note: All permissions are optional and requested only when needed for specific features.

minors.title: Children's Privacy
minors.body: Petlytics does not knowingly collect information from children under 13. The app is designed for pet owners of all ages and contains no personal data collection.

security.title: Data Security
security.body: Your data is stored securely on your device using standard iOS/Android security measures. We recommend keeping your device locked and up to date.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.body: Since all data is stored locally, you have complete control over retention. Delete the app or clear app data to remove all information.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.body: If we update this policy, we'll notify users through the app. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

play.title: Google Play Requirements
bullets: This app complies with Google Play Developer Program Policies
No personal data is collected or shared
No third-party analytics or advertising SDKs
All data remains on user's device
